nodes.id: 台湾公共广播电视集团

zh-cn: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 台湾第一个、亦是目前唯一的公共媒体事业群，由公共电视文化事业基金会和中华电视公司两个中华民国政府捐赠出资的媒体机构组成。
description.en: Taiwan's first and only public media group, composed of the Public Television Service Foundation (PTS) and the Chinese Television System (CTS), both funded by donations from the Republic of China government.

nodes.id: 公共电视文化事业基金会

zh-cn: 公共电视文化事业基金会

description.zh-cn: 台湾的公共电视机构，与中华电视公司共同组成台湾公共广播电视集团。
description.en: The public television service in Taiwan, which, together with the Chinese Television System, forms the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的无线电视台之一，与公共电视文化事业基金会共同组成台湾公共广播电视集团。
description.en: One of Taiwan's terrestrial television stations, which, together with the Public Television Service Foundation, forms the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 台湾公共广播电视集团旗下的电视频道，主要服务客家族群。
description.en: A television channel under the Taiwan Broadcasting System, primarily serving the Hakka ethnic group.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的少数民族语言电视台。曾为台湾公共广播电视集团成员，后改由原住民族文化事业基金会经营。
description.en: An indigenous language television station in Taiwan. It was formerly a member of the Taiwan Broadcasting System and is now operated by the Indigenous Peoples Cultural Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 曾为台湾公共广播电视集团成员的频道，主要面向海外侨胞，于2018年停止营运。
description.en: A former channel of the Taiwan Broadcasting System, primarily targeting overseas Taiwanese communities, which ceased operations in 2018.

nodes.id: 《无线电视事业公股处理条例》

zh-cn: 《无线电视事业公股处理条例》

description.zh-cn: 为处理台湾无线电视事业中政府持有的股份而制定的法律，是推动党政军退出媒体及成立公广集团的关键法源。
description.en: An act enacted to handle government-held shares in Taiwan's terrestrial television industry, which was a key legal basis for promoting the withdrawal of party-political-military influence from the media and the establishment of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在将台湾的无线电视台转型为公共服务的社会及政治运动，促成了台湾公共广播电视集团的成立。
description.en: A social and political movement in Taiwan aimed at transforming terrestrial television stations into public services, which led to the establishment of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院的已裁撤机构，原负责国家新闻、传播及出版等事务，在公广集团成立过程中扮演重要角色。
description.en: A former agency of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China, previously responsible for national news, broadcasting, and publishing affairs, which played an important role in the establishment of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任行政院新闻局局长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Director-General of the Government Information Office.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的媒体改革倡议团体，积极推动成立公共广播电视集团。
description.en: A media reform advocacy group in Taiwan that actively promoted the establishment of a public broadcasting group.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、电影人，曾任公广集团首任总经理。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer and filmmaker who served as the first General Manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 台湾音乐家与政治人物，曾任行政院文建会主委及台湾公共广播电视集团董事长。
description.en: A Taiwanese musician and politician who served as the chair of the Council for Cultural Affairs and later as the chairperson of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 台湾影视制作人，映画传播董事长，曾任公广集团（华视）总经理。
description.en: A Taiwanese television producer, chairman of Trans-Asia Television Production, and former general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System (CTS).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国文化事务的最高主管机关，自2012年起接管公广集团。
description.en: The highest authority for cultural affairs in the Republic of China, which has overseen the Taiwan Broadcasting System since 2012.

nodes.id: 原住民族文化事业基金会

zh-cn: 原住民族文化事业基金会

description.zh-cn: 负责经营原住民族电视台的财团法人。
description.en: The foundation responsible for operating the Indigenous Television.

description.zh-cn: 台湾公共广播电视集团旗下的国际影音串流平台与电视频道。
description.en: An international video streaming platform and television channel under the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 规范台湾公共电视运作的法律。2023年修法，正式将客家电视台纳入公视基金会所属频道。
description.en: The law governing the operations of public television in Taiwan. A 2023 amendment formally incorporated Hakka TV as a channel under the Public Television Service Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 律师、大学教授，首任公广集团董事长。
description.en: Lawyer and university professor, the first chairman of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 国立政治大学教育学系副教授，曾任公广集团董事长。
description.en: Associate professor in the Department of Education at National Chengchi University, former chairman of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 明华园团长，曾任公广集团董事长。
description.en: Director of Ming Hwa Yuan Arts & Cultural Group, former chairman of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学教授，首位公广集团女性董事长，并曾兼任总经理。
description.en: Professor at Tamkang University, the first female chairperson of the Taiwan Broadcasting System, and also served concurrently as general manager.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任行政院新闻局长及公广集团董事长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as Director-General of the Government Information Office and chairman of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 国立政治大学广告系教授，曾代理公广集团董事长并暂兼总经理。
description.en: Professor in the Department of Advertising at National Chengchi University, served as acting chairman and interim general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 国立中正大学传播学系教授，现任公广集团董事长。
description.en: Professor in the Department of Communication at National Chung Cheng University, current chairman of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 蕃薯藤数位科技公司执行长，曾任公广集团总经理。
description.en: CEO of yam蕃薯藤, former general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 高点电视台董事长，曾两度担任公广集团总经理。
description.en: Chairman of High Point TV, served twice as general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 曾任公广集团总经理，现任台湾索尼音乐娱乐中国大陆暨台湾首席执行官。
description.en: Former general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System, currently CEO of Sony Music Entertainment Greater China.

description.zh-cn: 媒体人，曾任公广集团总经理。
description.en: Media professional, former general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 资深媒体人，曾任公广集团总经理。
description.en: Veteran media professional, former general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 台湾新闻主播及主持人，曾代理公广集团总经理。
description.en: A Taiwanese news anchor and host, served as acting general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 华视副总经理，曾代理公广集团总经理。
description.en: Vice President of CTS, served as acting general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 曾任三立电视、东森电视副总经理，后任公广集团总经理。
description.en: Former vice president of Sanlih E-Television and Eastern Television, later served as general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 公视总经理，曾代理兼任公广集团总经理。
description.en: General Manager of PTS, served as acting and concurrent general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

description.zh-cn: 国立政治大学新闻系教授，现任公广集团总经理。
description.en: Professor in the Department of Journalism at National Chengchi University, current general manager of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

relationships.source: 公共电视文化事业基金会
relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 公视基金会与中华电视公司共同组成台湾公广集团。
description.en: The Public Television Service Foundation and the Chinese Television System jointly formed the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 中华电视公司与公视基金会共同组成台湾公广集团。
description.en: The Chinese Television System and the Public Television Service Foundation jointly formed the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 依据《无线电视事业公股处理条例》，客家电视台于2007年1月1日加入公广集团。
description.en: According to the 'Act for the Disposition of Government Shareholdings in Terrestrial Television Industry', Hakka TV joined the Taiwan Broadcasting System on January 1, 2007.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 依据《无线电视事业公股处理条例》加入公广集团，后于2014年改由原住民族文化事业基金会经营而退出。
description.en: Joined the Taiwan Broadcasting System according to the 'Act for the Disposition of Government Shareholdings in Terrestrial Television Industry', and later withdrew in 2014 when its operation was transferred to the Indigenous Peoples Cultural Foundation.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 依据《无线电视事业公股处理条例》加入公广集团，于2018年停止营运。
description.en: Joined the Taiwan Broadcasting System according to the 'Act for the Disposition of Government Shareholdings in Terrestrial Television Industry', and ceased operations in 2018.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: Taiwan+ 电视频道于2022年10月3日正式开播，为公广集团成员。
description.en: The Taiwan+ television channel officially launched on October 3, 2022, as a member of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

relationships.source: 《无线电视事业公股处理条例》
relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 该条例公布实施，为公广集团的成立提供了法律依据，规定政府应将持有的华视股份捐赠给公视基金会，并要求客家、原住民等频道交由公视基金会办理。
description.en: The promulgation of this act provided the legal basis for the establishment of the Taiwan Broadcasting System, stipulating that the government should donate its shares in CTS to the PTS Foundation and mandating that channels like Hakka TV and Indigenous TV be managed by the PTS Foundation.

relationships.target: 无线电视公共化

position.en: Director-General of the Government Information Office

description.zh-cn: 时任行政院新闻局长苏正平在立法院表示，将推动“无线电视公共化”，首先的目标是台视与华视。
description.en: Then Director-General of the Government Information Office, Su Tzen-ping, stated in the Legislative Yuan that the government would promote the 'publicization of terrestrial television', with TTV and CTS as the initial targets.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 发起“媒体要改革，公民来连署——让我们催生公共广播电视集团”连署行动，以催生公广集团。
description.en: Launched the 'Media Reform, Citizens' Petition - Let's Bring a Public Broadcasting Group into Being' signature campaign to advocate for the creation of the group.

relationships.target: 公共电视文化事业基金会

description.zh-cn: 时任华视总经理小野在公听会上批评公视基金会处处干预华视、强迫华视照公视的方式走，导致华视成为“非公非商”的“四不像”。
description.en: Then CTS General Manager Ono criticized the PTS Foundation at a public hearing for constantly interfering with CTS and forcing it to follow PTS's model, turning CTS into a 'neither fish nor fowl' entity.

relationships.target: 郭建宏 (制作人)

description.zh-cn: 时任董事长陈郁秀主导的华视董事会，以七大罪状为由无预警解除总经理郭建宏的职务。
description.en: The CTS board of directors, led by then-chairperson Tchen Yu-chiou, abruptly dismissed General Manager Kuo Chien-hung, citing seven major accusations.

relationships.target: 台湾公共广播电视集团

description.zh-cn: 因行政院新闻局裁撤，文化部于2012年5月20日成立并接手管理公广集团。
description.en: Following the dissolution of the Government Information Office, the Ministry of Culture was established on May 20, 2012, and took over the management of the Taiwan Broadcasting System.

relationships.source: 原住民族文化事业基金会
relationships.target: 原住民电视台

description.zh-cn: 原住民族电视台自2014年1月1日起改由原住民族文化事业基金会经营。
description.en: As of January 1, 2014, the Indigenous Television has been operated by the Indigenous Peoples Cultural Foundation.

relationships.target: 客家电视台

description.zh-cn: 2023年6月21日修正公布的《公共电视法》，正式将客家电视台的地位确立为公视基金会所属频道。
description.en: The amended Public Television Act, promulgated on June 21, 2023, formally established Hakka TV's status as a channel under the Public Television Service Foundation.
